column3: “This is great strain for days when you want a full body stone with no sativa kick at all. it isn't a full couch lock strain but still very heavy in the body. The purple on this strain is amazing. very little green and tons of trichomes”

“One of my favorites. Smell and taste on the mild side. High is the most calming I've ever experienced and comes on almost immediately. Good body high but doesn't knock you out. Just makes everything feel alright - not euphoric or energetic so much, just totally calm and content, like all is right with the world.”

“Location: L'Eagle Services 
THC: 17.87%
CBD: 0.00%

Appearance Rating: 5.00
Appearance Description: These buds are a goldish color with hints of purple. The thick, red hairs are a vibrant orange-red color. These compact and dense nugs are extremely frosty and well manicured. 

Taste Rating: 4.00
Taste Description:  The flavor on this strain is incredibly unique. It has a mix of earth and berry, but also a slight spic...”

“as a RLS suffer, I wanted to try this and sure enough great body high (takes a bit to feel it but it's awesome) it numbs me just enough so I can easily sleep and cuddle in my blanket, great medicine,”

“Our caregiver is crossing the PCK with an OG cut but the PCK comes through hard. It's a fantastic heavy body stone that I really enjoy because it has the heavy painkiller effects that I need at night. Starts in my teeth and gums and just spreads from there until my whole body is numb. For high tolerance users this probably won't be a day wrecker but watch out if you're not used to 100% indica's, I usually have a max ...”

“Excellent pain meds! Similar to Afghani in its strong indica body effects, except not as sedating. Very heavy, dense buds- medium packed bowl was potent. Smelled spicy, but the taste was smooth fruity kush-ness was easy to vape and kind to the lungs even to the end of the bowl.”

“One of the most pleasant smokes I've ever smoked.
Great (strong, spicy, sweet, citron) smell and tast, and delivers a really nice body-stone.
Very calming indeed, as others already mentioned. Doesn't knock you out completely but brings you to the most pleasant state ever!!”

“This hardy Pakistani indica looks and tastes every bit as fancy as its name.  Boasting big nuggets of crystal coated buds, this is a couch-locker for sure.  Great for sleep and appetite, but don't plan on going anywhere for a while. Hunker down with Netflix and some Doritos and expect a fun ride.”
“A bit sweet with wooden tones. Awesome dark purple colour. Very relaxing, no anxiety and a bit of psychedelia. Sabor poco dulce con tonos madera. Definitely in my top favs.”
“Effects are slow to come on but hit hard. Don't plan on going anywhere but you wont be fighting from falling asleep. Probably the gnarliest cottonmouth I've ever had though.”
“Definitely some potent herb. I smoked it New Year Day with some family power tokin'" like a muthafucka. One bowl took three of us the highest place you can go
column5: spicy-sweet taste that's mellow on the tongue. I got HAF!!! Need more!!!”"

column3: “Instant favorite. This is the best indica I've ever smoked. Hands down. Perfect, long-lasting body high that's never too overwhelming. Incredible caramel/chocolate/berry flavor profile. Great for relaxing or pain maintenance...I've been smoking it semi-regularly for about a month now and REALLY found out its positive effects for pain after having now injured both knees(one rather severely) over the last week and a ha...”
“One of the best histrains I've smoked. Very nice flavor a delicious smell. Made me stoned as a fucking mountain.”

“Ahhhh, an old school buzz. Super chill, relaxed. Mild psychoactive properties, visual acuity seemed heightened. Very tasty without the overpowering pine terps. Didn't lock me up. Positive libido. Will never pass it up.”

“Let me start off with saying the strain I bought was Purple Pakistani, but after searching, I found out it was also this strain, Pakistani chiral kush. WOW!!! I might of found my next favorite strain, next to GDP and Ingrid for night time pain relief! There is no roller coaster ride to this one, it slowly sneaks up behind the eyes and your body goes limp and heavy. Sometimes you just want to medicate without the roll...”
“Picked up some of this. It has very good indica effects but I'm not a favourite of the taste of strains from the region. Would still recommend.”

“This was the most bunk weed I've smoked for a while- and hope it was only this particular grower and/or crop. I should have returned it, this was how bad it was. Barely any buzz from it, and the bag as well as container I used to hold my stash in while smoking an ounce of it had NO crystals on it afterwards. Bunk! Like I said, maybe it was just particular grower and crop- grown by Leaves of Grass and sold by The Happ...”
“the smoothest weed ever. calm me down with a big smile in my face.”
“Picked up some of this. It has very good indica effects but I'm not a favourite of the taste of strains from the region. Would still recommend.”
“Awesome taste. Very strong indica with fantastic blend of flavors”

“Purchased this strain as ''Purple Chitral'' at my SQDC legal weed shop. I has a very potent smell of pine, with some spicy notes on the nose. The taste is a bit earthy and tastes like a sweet cheese flavour! 

The buzz is a good indica headbuzz, nothing too strong as it was tested at 16% THC, but definitely something that will get you in the mood to play video games or watch a good movie.”

“I recently came across this strain, and am thankful for it! 

A very deep, soothing, and mellow High. 

Cheers!  🍷”
“A truly stress reliever!!!”

“More lemony than floral. Definitely one of the creep up on you body high. Perfect for trying to sleep. Be sure you have absolutely nothing to do before consuming because it does make you feel like you don't want to get up.”

“A subtle, creamy Kush flavour with lots of berry and menthol undertones and a sweet, meditational buzz make this a very unique and coveted plant. 

The lack of any noticeable sativa influence makes for a very calming, deceptively strong creeper of a buzz. Not necessarily total couch lock, but you won't want to move too far! 

Extremely enjoyable and delicious.”
“relaxing.”
“I enjoy the relaxation associated with the use of this strain.”
“Probably the best Indica I have ever used!”

“The weed itself was nice and resiny looking with purple buds that were a bit looser than I expected for an indica. This came after two weeks of waiting from OCS, the buds were a bit dry when I got it, but since I was vaping it this wasn't too big a deal. 

The smell is definitely floral, almost sweet. When you bust it up you get more of the smell and a more typical kush" type smell to it (Beta-pinene and alpha-pinen...”"

“In my experience, Pakistani Landraces have the potential to be the strongest indicas-even more so than most Afghanis. Smoked this many years ago and thought I'd review it now. If you smoke 3-4 bong rips of this in quick succession you will be absolutely glued to the couch. And i mean REAL couhlock where it feels like a rhino is sitting on your body. This goes on for hours and hours. The day will be a write-off and ev...”
“Great on the bod. Not too stoney”
“I usually don't smoke anything over 15% THC but this one is the exception. wonderful strain very calming, no anxiety. The only con is that the smell won't blow you away.”
“read many good things about this strain and I'm trying some now to see if it will make me hungry then knock me back.  three hits so far and not really feeling any..., oh wait, ahhhh”

“Very relaxing, all anxiety was gone. Euphoric and giggly. Tried multiple strains from the SQDC..this one hits top 3 for sure.
Purple Chitral by San Rafael. 16%THC.”
“relaxing ooze”

“Purple Chitral
brand : San Rafael

Very good weed, a nice mood for working on computer and chill, le taste is really good and the colour of the buds is impressive with purple mark.

The star missing is because after each time, a wild headache appear. Otherwise its vrm good”

“Absolutely amazing. Bought as purple chitral from the SQDC, it gives me a VERY relax body high, perfect to watch tv or play games. I usually get some anxiety with most strains but with this one, absolutely nothing. Highly recommend.”

“Definitely my favourite strain, it always makes me really creative and gives me the impression of being in a videogame, it's awesome! Its purple buds smell like lemon and gives this weed a really good aroma.”

“I've never in my life wrote a review. I've been smoking medicinally for 20 years, I won't bore you with details, but this may be one of the best I've ever had in every category. Be careful to not be out and about. WOW”

“Very relaxing, good for pain, and sleep you take more doses. 1 puff is equal to 1 dose. 2 tokes on this strain is perfect for daytime use.
Anything more and couch locked unless your a heavy consumer. I've noticed the middle east strains seem to be the best. If you look at the frosted purple crystals under a magnifying glass, you'll notice the amber color in this batch. This was grown to peek potency with mostly a bod...”

“Strain: Purple Chitral (By San Rafel ’71)
Ancestry: Pakistani Chitral Kush
Type: Indica
THC: 17%
CBD: 0%
Flower quality: 2/5 - Nice green and purple inside. Bud are unfortunately small and long. Nice tricromes but the buds are really dry, Maybe because of the cheap 1g packaging.
Aroma: Floral , Fruity , Lilac
Taste: No significant taste at first, then some hint of cheese. Harsh on the throat too.
Effects and notes:	W...”

“First indoor im smoking right now, and its The Best heaven's flower ive tasted! 😃😄 gently lets you know you're gonna enjoy each n vryone of t 7 or 8 (180%speed) inhale & exhales u're gonna taste its next calw" with!  😊 😋

column1: iNcredibly nice high! Let that mandarin and orangy aroma know
column2: when u need to stop njoyin it..butt it'LL go on'n'on! 😃”"

column3: “My favorite strain so far. Gives you a sense of relaxation and focus. Fun social and creative energy.”

“One of my favorites! Very happy , relaxed in the head, heavy visuals, trippy , euphoria, psychedelic felt like and saw a vision like i was in a trance and visited the village chitral  for what if named for. Citral comes from there.”

“This one of my favorite bedtime strains, it should be called the “velvet hammer”. It give me a brief feeling of euphoria and a great body high that makes me forget my aching arthritic knees and I typically just lose consciousness without remembering drifting off to sleep. My wife and I actually jokingly refer to it as “Pakistani Cunnilingus Kush”; as my wife has aged and after 3 kids she finds oral sex too intense to...”
“strong pleasant body stone, little intoxicating but controlable. laborer weed for after work muscle stiffness”
“find it hits harsh,  and doesn't help with the pain.  makes me feel dizzy. about 10-20 min of that I start relaxing.”
“strong pleasant body stone, little intoxicating but controlable. laborer weed for after work muscle stiffness”

“Very smooth. This is the first time I've smoked in about a yearide  (not by choice lol) just wanted to feel relaxed and think a little bit. Nice body high not much giggly which I love but all around a good high 👍”

“Easily one of the most wonderful smelling strains. A really interesting aroma of citrus and sage. Perfect for knocking you out for the night. Don't plan on going anywhere after smoking this strain. This is the epitome of couch lock. Perfect for relaxing at home.”
“The best indica I have had in a long time. Amazing taste too. Perfect for a movie or a walk in the park. Get it if you can find it.”

“this is so far the only strain that really gives me the full body high enough to be cozy up to a blanket and resting peacefully. Definitely  tames my RLS. I'll be looking for this every chance I get.”
“Amazing one of the best! Nice smooth flavor and very deep bake. Two thumbs up!”
“available at SQDC”

“Very good taste but the effects for a indica are lacking.. Makes things calmer but does not provide much euphoria or body stone but mostly a head high on the forehead.. Not bad.. Flavor of berries is great!”
